channel.title: CVE Feed for HackerOne -- content node module
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HackerOne -- content node module

item.title: CVE-2017-16111|2024-09-16T20:37:31.202Z -- hackerone -- content%20node%20module
item.description: The content module is a module to parse HTTP Content-* headers. It is used by the hapijs framework to provide this functionality. The module is vulnerable to regular expression denial of service when passed a specifically crafted Content-Type or Content-Disposition header.
